sent.orig: Based on xifeng liquor, Fen-flavor &Luzhou-flavor liquor and Fen-flavor &Luzhou-flavor &Maotai-flavor liquors were developed successfully.
sent.trans: 以凤型白酒为基础，进行单兼或多兼，开发出凤兼浓、凤浓酱兼香型白酒。

sent.orig: Different from Luzhou-flavor liquor and Maotai-flavor liquor, sesame-flavor liquor is the liquor of independent flavor type.
sent.trans: 芝麻香型白酒是位于浓香和酱香之间的一个独立的香型。

sent.orig: Such flavoring liquid had composite flavor of pits flavor and fermented grains flavor and aftertaste clear.
sent.trans: 该黄水调味液具有窖香、糟香的复合香和尾净的特点。

sent.orig: Giving flavor to sweet flavor, used in many perfumes and soap flavor.
sent.trans: 能赋予香精以甜的气息，用在许多香水和皂用香精中。

sent.orig: Finally, flavor finger printing technology was used to test the stability of beef flavor.
sent.trans: 并利用气味指纹分析技术对牛肉香精的热稳定性进行了表征。
